thread.title: Uber's use of fewer sensors questioned after AZ death

title: Uber's use of fewer sensors questioned after AZ death
text:
Uber's use of fewer sensors questioned after AZ death Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 02:07 
When Uber decided in 2016 to retire its fleet of self-driving Ford Fusion cars in favor of Volvo SUVs, it also chose to scale back on one notable piece of technology: the safety sensors used to detect objects on the road.   
When Uber decided in 2016 to retire its fleet of self-driving Ford Fusion cars in favor of Volvo SUVs, it also chose to scale back on one notable piece of technology: the safety sensors used to detect objects on the road.  //reut.rs/2Gyr4nj
